computers.description: Control 2 factories per population
computers.name: Robotics Controls 2

computers.description: Level 1 targeting computer
computers.name: Battle Computer Mark 1

computers.description: Displays enemy ship stats, adds +3 initiative to the equipped ship, and adds 1 to the targeting system of the equipped computer.
computers.name: Battle Scanner

computers.description: Adds 1 level to the missile defense rating of any ship that has it equipped.
computers.name: ECM Jammer Mark 1

computers.description: This technology allows your colonies to detect ships within a distance of 5 from each of your colonies and allows your ships to detect enemy ships at a distance of 1
computers.name: Deep Space Scanner

computers.description: Increases attack rating by two

computers.description: Allows each population unit to control 3 factories.

computers.description: Increases attack rating by three

computers.description: Increases missile defense rating by three
computers.name: ECM Jammer Mark III

computers.description: Allows your colonies to detect enemy ships at a distance of 7 and allows your ships to detect enemy ships at a distance of 2. These scanners also allow you to determine the planet the enemy ships are travelling to and their ETA.

computers.description: Increases attack rating by five.

computers.description: Increases missile defense rating by five.
computers.name: ECM Jammer Mark V

computers.description: Allows your colonies to detect enemy ships at a distance of 9 and allows your ships to detect enemy ships at a distance of 3. Allows you to determine planet size, environment, habitability, and resources at a distance of 9 on the galactic map without having a ship in orbit over the colony.
computers.name: Advanced Space Scanner

computers.description: Increases missile defense rating by six.
computers.name: Battle Computer Mark VI

computers.description: Increases missile defense rating by six.
computers.name: ECM Jammer Mark VI

computers.description: Allows each population unit to control 5 factories.

computers.description: Increases attack rating by 7.

computers.description: Increases missile defense rating by 7.

computers.description: Increases attack rating by 8.

computers.description: Increases missile defense rating by 8.

computers.description: Allows all 'direct fire' weapons on the equipped ship to act as if they have the 'armor piercing' quality. This includes pretty much everything except missiles, torpedoes, bombs, and anything that counts as a special system.

computers.description: Increases missile defense rating by 10.
computers.name: ECM Jammer Mark X

computers.description: Allows each population unit to control 7 factories.
computers.name: Improved Robotic Controls VII

computers.description: Decreases the enemy's attack rating by 2 - 6 each time it is fired.

computers.description: Increases attack rating by 11.

construction.description: Standard armor for ships and missile bases. Gives small ships 3 hit points, medium ships 18 hit points, large ships 100 hit points, and assault ships 600 hit points. Gives missile bases 15 hit points.
construction.name: Titanium Armor

construction.description: Reduces the cost to construct a factory to 9 BCs.
construction.name: Industrial Tech 9

construction.description: Reduces the pollution by factories to 80% of its original amount.
construction.name: Reduced Industrial Waste 80%

construction.description: Reduces the cost to construct a factory to 8 BCs.
construction.name: Industrial Tech 8

construction.description: Increases the armor protection on ships that equip it by 50% (round down). Adds 5 to ground combat rolls. Replaces titanium armor which really provides no sort of benefit anyway.
construction.name: Duralloy Armor

construction.description: Adds 10 to ground combat rolls.
construction.name: Battle Suits

construction.description: Reduces the cost to construct a factory to 7 BCs.
construction.name: Industrial Tech 7

construction.description: 'Heals' each equipped ship 15% of its maximum hit points per turn.
construction.name: Automated Repair Unit

construction.description: Reduces the pollution by factories to 60% of its original amount.
construction.name: Reduced Industrial Waste 60%

construction.description: Increases the armor protection on ships that equip it by 100%. Adds 10 to ground combat rolls. Replaces any other kind of armor on ground combat troops that is lower than itself.

construction.name: Industrial Tech 6

construction.description: Adds 20 to ground combat rolls. Replaces Battle Suits.
construction.name: Armored Exoskeleton

construction.description: Reduces pollution by factories to 40% of its original amount.
construction.name: Reduced Industrial Waste 40%

construction.description: Increases the hit points of equipped ships by 150% of the original amount (round down). Adds 15 to ground combat rolls. Replaces any other kind of armor on ground combat troops that is lower than itself.
construction.name: Andrium Armor

construction.description: Reduces the cost to construct a factory to 4 BCs.
construction.name: Industrial Tech 4

construction.description: Reduces the cost to construct a factory to 3 BCs.
construction.name: Industrial Tech 3

construction.description: Increases the hit points of equipped ships by 200% of the original amount. Adds 20 to ground combat rolls. Replaces any other kind of armor on ground combat troops that is lower than itself.
construction.name: Tritanium Armor

construction.description: Reduces pollution by factories to 20% of its original amount.
construction.name: Reduced Industrial Waste 20%

construction.description: 'Heals' each equipped ship 30% of its maximum hit points per turn.
construction.name: Advanced Damage Control Unit

construction.description: Reduces the cost to construct a factory to 2 BCs.
construction.name: Industrial Tech 2

construction.description: Adds 30 to ground combat rolls. Replaces Battle Suits and Armored Exoskeleton.
construction.name: Powered Armor

construction.description: Increases the hit points of equipped ships by 250% of the original amount (round down). Adds 25 to ground combat rolls. Replaces any other kind of armor on ground combat troops that is lower than itself.
construction.name: Adamantium Armor

construction.description: Reduces pollution by factories to 0% of its original amount. Completely eliminates all pollution by factories owned.

construction.description: Increases the hit points of equipped ships by 300% of the original amount. Adds 30 to ground combat rolls. Replaces any other kind of armor on ground combat troops that is lower than itself.
construction.name: Neutronium Armor

shields.description: Reduces all damage to equipped targets by 1.

shields.description: Reduces all damage to equipped targets by 4.

shields.description: Adds 20 to ground combat rolls. Replaces Personal Deflector Shield.

shields.name: Cloaking Device

shields.description: Has a 75% chance per missile to destroy all missiles connecting with an equipped ship minus 1% per technology level of the missile.

shields.description: Reduces all damage to equipped targets by 9.
shields.name: Class IX Deflector Shield

shields.description: Removes the target from combat completely for 1 turn. Combat proceeds as if the target didn't exist.

shields.description: Has a 100% chance per missile to destroy all missiles connecting with an equipped ship minus 1% per technology level of the missile.

shields.description: Reduces all damage to equipped targets by 15.

shields.description: Increases the hit points of equipped ships by 300% of the original amount. Adds 30 to ground combat rolls. Replaces any other kind of armor on ground combat troops that is lower than itself.

planetology.description: Eliminates 2 units of pollution for 1 BC.
planetology.name: Ecological Restoration

planetology.description: Increases maximum colonist units on the terraformed planet by 10, for a cost of 50 BC.
planetology.name: Terraforming +10

planetology.description: Allows ships equipped with this to sacrifice themselves to create a colony on a planet with a barren or better environment.
planetology.name: Controlled Barren Environment

planetology.description: Eliminates 3 units of pollution for 1 BC.
planetology.name: Improved Ecological Restoration

planetology.description: Allows ships equipped with this to sacrifice themselves to create a colony on a planet with a tundra or better environment.
planetology.name: Controlled Tundra Environment

planetology.description: Increases maximum colonist units on the terraformed planet by 20, for a cost of 100 BC.
planetology.name: Terraforming +20

planetology.description: Allows ships equipped with this to sacrifice themselves to create a colony on a planet with a dead or better environment.
planetology.name: Controlled Dead Environment

planetology.description: Ship weapon that reduces the maximum population of a planet by 1 each time it is fired. This is not affected by shields.
planetology.name: Death Spores

planetology.description: Allows ships equipped with this to sacrifice themselves to create a colony on a planet with a inferno or better environment.
planetology.name: Controlled Inferno Environment

planetology.description: Eliminates 5 units of pollution for 1 BC.
planetology.name: Enhanced Ecological Restoration

planetology.description: Increases maximum colonist units on the terraformed planet by 30, for a cost of 150 BC.
planetology.name: Terraforming +30

planetology.description: Allows ships equipped with this to sacrifice themselves to create a colony on a planet with a Toxic or better environment.
planetology.name: Controlled Toxic Environment

planetology.description: Converts normal environments to fertile environments for a cost of 150 BC. Increases the base size of the planet by 25%.
planetology.name: Soil Enrichment

planetology.description: Reduces the damage to population from all death weapons by 1.
planetology.name: Bio Toxin Antidote

planetology.description: Allows ships equipped with this to sacrifice themselves to create a colony on a planet with a radiated or better environment.
planetology.name: Controlled Radiated Environment

planetology.description: Increases maximum colonist units on the terraformed planet by 40, for a cost of 200 BC.
planetology.name: Terraforming +40

planetology.description: Reduces the cost to create one unit of population to 10 BC.
planetology.name: Cloning

planetology.description: Converts hostile environments to normal environments for a cost of 150 BCs.
planetology.name: Atmospheric Terraforming

planetology.description: Eliminates 10 units of pollution for 1 BC.
planetology.name: Advanced Ecological Restoration

planetology.description: Increases maximum colonist units on the terraformed planet by 50, for a cost of 250 BC.
planetology.name: Terraforming +50

planetology.description: Ship weapon that reduces the maximum population of a planet by 2 each time it is fired. This is not affected by shields.
planetology.name: Doom Virus

planetology.description: Converts fertile environments to gaia environments for a cost of 300 BC. Increases the base size of the planet by 50%.
planetology.name: Advanced Soil Enrichment

planetology.description: Increases maximum colonist units on the terraformed planet by 60, for a cost of 300 BC.
planetology.name: Terraforming +60

planetology.description: Eliminates 20 units of pollution for 1 BC.
planetology.name: Complete Ecological Restoration

planetology.description: Reduces the damage to population from all death weapons by 2.
planetology.name: Universal Antidote

planetology.description: Increases maximum colonist units on the terraformed planet by 80, for a cost of 400 BC.
planetology.name: Terraforming +80

planetology.description: Ship weapon that reduces the maximum population of a planet by 3 each time it is fired. This is not affected by shields.
planetology.name: Bio Terminator

planetology.description: Reduces the cost to create one unit of population to 5 BC.
planetology.name: Cloning

planetology.description: Increases maximum colonist units on the terraformed planet by 100, for a cost of 500 BC.
planetology.name: Terraforming +100

planetology.description: Increases maximum colonist units on the terraformed planet by 120, for a cost of 600 BC.
planetology.name: Complete Terraforming

propulsion.description: Allows equipped ships to travel at 1 parsec per turn and gives a maximum number of movement squares in space combat of 1.
propulsion.name: Retro Engines

propulsion.description: Allows all ships to move a distance of 4 away from the owner's colonies.
propulsion.name: Hydrogen Fuel Cells

propulsion.description: Allows all ships to move a distance of 5 away from the owner's colonies.
propulsion.name: Deutrium Fuel Cells

propulsion.description: Allows equipped ships to travel at 2 parsecs per turn and gives a maximum number of movement squares in space combat of 1.
propulsion.name: Nuclear Engines

propulsion.description: Allows all ships to move a distance of 6 away from the owner's colonies.
propulsion.name: Irridium Fuel Cells

propulsion.description: Increases the maneuverability rating of the equipped ship by 2 and increases the maximum number of movement squares in space combat by 1.
propulsion.name: Inertial Stabilizer

propulsion.description: Allows equipped ships to travel at 3 parsecs per turn and gives a maximum number of movement squares in space combat of 1.
propulsion.name: Sub Light Drives

propulsion.description: Allows all ships to move a distance of 7 away from the owner's colonies.
propulsion.name: Dotomite Crystals

propulsion.description: Deals 5 damage to all adjacent and diagonally adjacent ships plus 1 damage per 2 attacking ships.
propulsion.name: Energy Pulsar

propulsion.description: Allows equipped ships to travel at 4 parsecs per turn and gives a maximum number of movement squares in space combat of 2.
propulsion.name: Fusion Drives

propulsion.description: Allows all ships to move a distance of 8 away from the owner's colonies.
propulsion.name: Uridium Fuel Cells

propulsion.description: Ship special that reduces the defender's maneuverability rating by 0-1 per turn.
propulsion.name: Warp Dissipator

propulsion.description: Allows all ships to move a distance of 9 away from the owner's colonies.
propulsion.name: Reajax II Fuel Cells

propulsion.description: Allows equipped ships to travel at 5 parsecs per turn and gives a maximum number of movement squares in space combat of 2.
propulsion.name: Impulse Drives

propulsion.description: Ships can travel between any colonies controlled by the owner that have star gates in 1 turn. Costs 3000 BCs to create. Constructed as if it were a ship design.
propulsion.name: Intergalactic Star Gates

propulsion.description: Allows all ships to move a distance of 10 away from the owner's colonies.
propulsion.name: Trilithium Crystals

propulsion.description: Allows equipped ships to travel at 6 parsecs per turn and gives a maximum number of movement squares in space combat of 3.
propulsion.name: Ion Drives

propulsion.description: Increases the attack range of all the direct fire weapons on the equipped ship by 3. This includes all weapons that are not missiles, torpedoes, death weapons, and bombs.
propulsion.name: High Energy Focus

propulsion.description: Allows equipped ships to travel at 7 parsecs per turn and gives a maximum number of movement squares in space combat of 3.
propulsion.name: Anti-Matter Drives

propulsion.description: Equipped ships always move first in combat and can teleport directly to any square on the battle grid.
propulsion.name: Sub Space Teleporter

propulsion.description: Deals 10 damage to all adjacent and diagonally adjacent ships plus 1 damage per 2 attacking ships.
propulsion.name: Ionic Pulsar

propulsion.description: Allows ships to travel an infinite distance from their owner's colonies.
propulsion.name: Thorium Cells

propulsion.description: Allows equipped ships to travel at 8 parsecs per turn and gives a maximum number of movement squares in space combat of 4.
propulsion.name: Inter-phased Drives

propulsion.description: Nullifies the functionality of all sub-space teleporters in use over the owner's planets.
propulsion.name: Sub Space Interdictor

propulsion.description: Ensures at least 50% of transporters land on the targeted planet.
propulsion.name: Combat Transporters

propulsion.description: Increases the maneuverability rating of the equipped ship by 4 and increases the maximum number of movement squares in space combat by 2.
propulsion.name: Inertial Nullifier

propulsion.description: Allows equipped ships to travel at 9 parsecs per turn and gives a maximum number of movement squares in space combat of 4.
propulsion.name: Hyper Drives

propulsion.description: Causes 33% of all attacks to miss the target automatically.
propulsion.name: Displacement Device

weapons.description: Deals 1-4 damage to the target.
weapons.name: Lasers

weapons.description: Deals 1-7 damage to the target with a range of 2.

weapons.description: Deals 4 damage to the target. Adds +1 level to the attacker's attack rating for this missile only.

weapons.description: Defensive Special Equipment. Destroys 40% of incoming missiles minus 1% per tech level of the missile.

weapons.description: Deals 2-5 damage, halves the effectiveness of the target's shields.
